## Source: ossf-package-analysis (24b5e5f328902483623b7534e8a303d7f117dbde786f488dbffacb4f8b24efe8)
The OpenSSF Package Analysis project identified 'customer-identity-mfe' @ 8.0.2 (npm) as malicious.

It is considered malicious because:

- The package communicates with a domain associated with malicious activity.

- The package executes one or more commands associated with malicious behavior.
